FAQ Before You Ask

Are your HR experts certified?

Yes. Two hold SPHR credentials, one is a parrot named Deputy Crumbs with impeccable instincts.

Why the snow globe?

Containment. Also when clients panic, we shake it and call it “change management training.”

Do meetings truly happen in a hot air balloon?

Every Tuesday and every crisis. If wind speed exceeds reason, we switch to carrier pigeon memos.
